entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Leonard

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25 except minus 32 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 except minus 32 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
